subtitle.translate: Compact items in a single drawer

description: Compacting Drawers are a nice way to compact items so you can access differnt varients of the item
Ores are the more common items to put into a compacting drawer.

An example is if you put iron into one, you put the nugget into the bottom right slot, then you can grab ingot and block forms that you can grab out if you have the amount in the drawer to grab one out
